Pico Digital | Onsite in San Diego, CA | full-time mid-career and entry level

We build television cable head-end systems using C++11 and embedded Linux platforms. Our current major technology development is the PD1600 platform (http://www.picodigital.com/product-details.php?ID=PD1600), which is a 16-blade system networked with a 48-port Gigabit Ethernet switch and a lot of FPGAs and additional processors. We move lots of video around over RF (cables) in several formats and IP (UDP/Ethernet).

At Pico, we have a preference for hands-dirty C/C++(11) programmers, but also like polyglots.

If interested, please email jobs@picodigital.com and mention hacker news.
